members.name: Hallway
members.description: A long hallway, with a door to the left and a door to the right.

members.name: Library
members.description: A large library, with many holocrons and books.

members.name: Dining Room
members.description: A large dining room, with many tables and chairs, spoons and forks, and a large table in the middle.

members.name: Cellar
members.description: A dark cellar, with many barrels and crates, it smells of wine and cheese. It's dark, and you can see nothing.

members.name: Lift
members.description: A lift, with a button to go up and a button to go down.

members.name: Down Hallway
members.description: A long hallway, with a door forward and a door to the right.

members.name: Arsenal
members.description: A large room, with many weapons and armour.

members.name: Medbay
members.description: A large room, with many beds and medical equipment.

members.name: Up Hallway
members.description: A long hallway, with a door forward and a door to the right.

members.name: Training Room
members.description: A large room, with many training droids and a large training area.

members.name: Council Room
members.description: A large room, with a large table in the middle, and a large window.
